examples: Sudden I heard a voice.
This is so sudden.
He made a sudden stand.
I had a sudden insight.
She had a sudden inspiration.
Her death was sudden.
She had a sudden heart attack.
The building gave a sudden shudder.
her sudden departure from the company
His death was very sudden.
A sudden hush fell over the crowd.
a sudden turn in the road
He felt a sudden pain in his leg.
All of a sudden the lights went out.
She felt a sudden pang of guilt.
She felt a sudden flush of anger.
The sudden storm queered our plans.
She had a sudden urge to be outside.
A sudden fit of ague shook him.
They saw a sudden gleam of light.
He gave a sudden jerk of his head.
We puzzled over her sudden departure.
There was a sudden release of oxygen.
He had a sudden flash of inspiration.
The sudden fame puffed her ego.
A sudden scream pierced the silence.
Wind caught the sudden puff of dust.
A sudden draught blew the door shut.
The van gave a sudden burst of speed.
Laughter is a vent of any sudden joy.
example_translate: На меня снизошло внезапное озарение. / Вдруг меня осенило.
У неё внезапно случился сердечный приступ.
Он почувствовал внезапную боль в ноге.
Ей вдруг ужасно захотелось оказаться на улице.
Он дрожал от внезапного приступа малярии.
Вдруг они увидели слабый проблеск света.
Мы были озадачены ее внезапным отъездом.
Столь неожиданная известность сверх всякой меры раздула её самомнение.
